tweets.text: BREAKING: Lakers star LeBron James will miss 2-3 weeks with a sprained ankle suffered in tonight's game against Boston. MRI confirmed no structural damage.
tweets.expected_summary: LeBron James - ankle sprain, out 2-3 weeks

tweets.text: Injury Update: Warriors' Stephen Curry (shoulder soreness) is questionable for tomorrow's game vs Phoenix. Team will monitor through warmups.
Sources: Milwaukee's Giannis Antetokounmpo will undergo an MRI on his knee after leaving tonight's game in the third quarter. Team is hopeful it's just a strain.
tweets.expected_summary: Giannis Antetokounmpo - knee issue, MRI pending

tweets.text: The Miami Heat have agreed to a trade sending Kyle Lowry to the Philadelphia 76ers for a 2025 first-round pick, sources tell @TheAthletic.
INJURY UPDATE: Phoenix Suns center Deandre Ayton has been ruled OUT for the next 4-6 weeks following surgery to repair a torn ligament in his left thumb. Surgery was successful.
tweets.expected_summary: Deandre Ayton - thumb surgery, out 4-6 weeks

tweets.text: Breaking: Joel Embiid will return to action tonight vs the Knicks after missing 5 games with a knee injury. He's officially listed as ACTIVE.
